CustomField.formula: IF ( EmailManualSendDatePassed__c, IF ( EmailManualSent__c, '✅ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Sent , IF ( TODAY() = EmailManualDate__c, IF ( TIMENOW() >= TIMEVALUE("09:15:00.000"), '❌ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_error, '⏳ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Scheduled), '❌ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_error )), '' )
CustomField.label: Status
